response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me and I believe it would be equally beneficial for you. Given its unique features and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am confident it will be worth every penny.

Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $900,000. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the potential return on investment for you.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product. I am here to provide you with all the information you need to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
